mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, name, email, address, role) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{address}, #{role})
mapper.select: select id, password, name, email, address, role from member where id = #{id}
select id, password, name, email, address, role from member;
mapper.delete: delete from member where id = #{id} and role != 'ADMIN'
